eventDecorators.name: Open
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

eventDecorators.name: Shutdown
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

eventDecorators.name: Unpaused
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

functionDecorators.name: beforeWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Vesper pools are using this function so it should exist in all strategies.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit collateral token from pool into Compound. Update pendingFee before deposit. Anyone can call it except when paused.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of collateral token to deposit.

functionDecorators.name: depositAll
functionDecorators.description: Deposit all collateral token from pool into Compound. Anyone can call it except when paused.

functionDecorators.name: interestEarned
functionDecorators.description: Returns interest earned in COMP since last rebalance. Make sure to return value in collateral token and in order to do that we are using Uniswap to get collateral amount for earned DAI.

functionDecorators.name: isReservedToken
functionDecorators.description: This method is deprecated and will be removed from Strategies in next release.

functionDecorators.name: isUpgradable
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if strategy can be upgraded. If there are no cTokens in strategy then it is upgradable.

functionDecorators.name: migrateIn
functionDecorators.description: Migrate tokens from pool to this address. Any working Compound strategy has cTokens in strategy contract.There can be scenarios when pool already has cTokens and new strategy will have to move those tokens from pool to self address.Only valid pool strategy is allowed to move tokens from pool.

functionDecorators.name: migrateOut
functionDecorators.description: Migrate tokens out to pool. There can be scenarios when we want to use new strategy without calling withdrawAll(). We can achieve this by moving tokens in pool and new strategy will take care from there.Pause this strategy, set pendingFee to zero and move tokens out.

functionDecorators.name: rebalance
functionDecorators.description: Calculate interest fee on earning from Compound and transfer fee to fee collector. Deposit available collateral from pool into Compound. Anyone can call it except when paused.

functionDecorators.name: sweepErc20
functionDecorators.description: Sweep given token to vesper pool. Reserved tokens are not allowed to sweep.

functionDecorators.name: token
functionDecorators.description: Returns address of Compound token correspond to collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: totalLocked
functionDecorators.description: Total collateral locked in Compound. This value will be used in pool share calculation, so true totalLocked will be balance in Compound minus any pending fee to collect.

returnDecorators.description: Return value will be in collateralToken defined decimal.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAll
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw all collateral from Compound and deposit into pool. Controller only function, called when migrating strategy.
